snippet.title: Acts of Blood - UE5 Beat 'em up game project (Reveal Trailer)
snippet.description:
So my friends and I have been working on this game project lately. It's still in the early stages, but overall, the game will be a beat 'em up with a linear storyline and exploration set in Indonesia, heavily inspired by Indonesian great action films like Merantau, The Raid, The Night Comes for Us, etc. Anyway, here's what we've been working on. Please let us know what you guys think :) Enjoy!

https://www.instagram.com/fajrulfnf/
https://twitter.com/Fajrul97
https://www.artstation.com/fajrulfnf
